nodes.bodyText: We need to check other user store managers as well. This is only for JDBCUserStoreManager.

Both username RegEx and role Name RegEx in other user stores are according to the required regular expression.

  
    
      carbon-kernel/core/org.wso2.carbon.user.core/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/user/core/ldap/ActiveDirectoryUserStoreConstants.java

      in
